title: The End of This Fairytale is One Hell of a Drama - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Aristocracy   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Nobles   Special Abilities   Transmigration   Writers
author: 칼퇴병자
description:
The girl and the prince welcomed a long and happy life at the end of the fairytale. However, life for the merely supporting character Lynette was not over yet.

She, who was left alone at the end of the fairytale, made a resolution. “I just want to live.”

Lynette practiced the principle of ‘living only once in this novel, I’ll do as I please,’ — making all kinds of gossip and spreading them.

[The handsome Master A of the family that is proud of their traditions is actually a pervert. This truth is only known by those maids who had quit work?]

In the midst of a beautiful fairytale turning into a drama, I’m going to meet the prince who is involved in a succession battle……

“Rejoice. Your Highness surprisingly has a vast amount of good luck in your grasp.”

“……luck?”

“That’s me.”

Roughly-living Lynette| Handsome doormat prince| A happy-end project!>
